Package com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.simulation

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.simulation.AbstractNode
      • com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.simulation.Node
  • public class Node
extends AbstractNode
    The Node class models a node in a distributed data model. Each Node has a collection of objects it manages. At the conclusion of the simulation, each node should, ideally, have the same state and all of the objects in one node are equivalent to the corresponding object in each of the other nodes.

      • addCRDT

        protected void addCRDT​(SimCRDTManager<? extends AbstractDataType> crdt)

        Adds a new CRDT to the node
        Overrides:
        addCRDT in class AbstractNode
        Parameters:

      • generateCreateOperation

        public <T extends AbstractDataType> java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> generateCreateOperation​(T object)
        Upon receipt of a new object to manage, this will allocate the CRDT for the object and return the create operation managers so the operation can be replicated at all other nodes.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type associated with the object being managed
        Parameters:
        object - The object being managed
        Returns:
        A collection of create operations which are intended for use at other nodes for replicating the create operation

      • generateReadOperation

        public java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> generateReadOperation()
        Generate and return a ReadOperation wrapped in a collection of Message instances to deliver to the other nodes in the simulation. Read operations are always marked as APPROVED even if performed on a non-managing node
        Returns:
        A collection of Messages containing the ReadOperation which is to be delivered to all of the other nodes

      • generateUpdateOperation

        public java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> generateUpdateOperation​(java.lang.Double pChange)
        Generate and return an UpdateOperation wrapped in a collection of Message instances to deliver to other nodes in the simulation. The operation is marked APPROVED only when it originates from the object's managing node. Otherwise it's marked PENDING.
        Parameters:
        pChange - Probability of changing the value of each of the object's field, applied independently against all mutable fields
        Returns:
        A collection of Messages containing the UpdateOperation with is to be delivered to all other nodes

      • generateDeleteOperation

        public java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> generateDeleteOperation()
        Generate and return an DeleteOperation wrapped in a collection of Message instances to deliver to other nodes in the simulation. The operation is marked APPROVED only when it originates from the object's managing node. Otherwise it's marked PENDING.
        Returns:
        A collection of Messages containing the DeleteOperation with is to be delivered to all other nodes

      • push

        protected <T extends AbstractDataType> java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> push​(Message<T> msg,
                                                                                                      java.lang.Double pReject)
        Forward the given message to the intended recipient CRDT this Node manages.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Generic type of the object the recipient CRDT manages which is tied to the generic type of the message.
        Parameters:
        msg - Message to deliver to the node
        pReject - Probability that the owning CRDT will reject an update or delete operation
        Returns:
        A collection of messages which result in delivery of the message. This will be an empty list if the recipient CRDT is not the owner of the object being managed.

      • checkMessageConsistency

        public void checkMessageConsistency()
        Check the content consistency of all of the sent and received messages on all of the CRDT's attached to this node.

      • checkMessageCount

        public void checkMessageCount()
        Check the count consistency of all of the sent and received messages on all of the CRDT's associated with this node.

      • checkOperationValidity

        public void checkOperationValidity()
        Check the operation validity for all operations managed within each CRDT associated with this node.
